mapper.select: select * from customer A inner join Zip B on A.ZipCode = B.ZipCode where cstId = #{cstId}
select * from orders, customer where orderDate = #{orderDate}

select * from Orders A inner join OptionPrice B on A.OptionCode = B.OptionCode inner join Item C on A.ItemId = C.ItemId inner join PayKind D on A.PayCode = D.PayCode inner join Delivery E on A.DlvChargeCode = E.DlvChargeCode inner join Zip F on A.ZipCode = F.ZipCode
